item.title: 达索系统全年营收增长，客户转向云软件
item.description: 法国软件制造商达索系统公布2025财年全年营收为62.4亿欧元（约合74.4亿美元），按固定汇率计算增长4%。其中经常性收入增长6%，主要得益于订阅服务收入激增11%——随着更多客户转向云端服务，订阅业务持续扩张。【原文：French software maker Dassault Systèmes reported full-year 2025 revenue of 6.24 billion euros ($7.44 billion), up 4% at constant currency, with recurring revenue growing 6%, driven by an 11% jump in subscriptions as more clients turn to cloud-based services.】

item.title: 施耐德预测2026年营收将温和增长，面临中国市场压力
item.description: 瑞士电梯制造商迅达公司表示，预计2026年以当地货币计价的营收将实现低至中个位数增长，主要市场新装业务的复苏有望抵消关税影响及中国市场的压力。【原文：Swiss lift and escalator maker Schindler said it expects 2026 revenue to grow by low- to mid-single digits in local currencies, anticipating recovering new installations in key markets to offset tariff impacts and pressure in China.】

item.title: 海尼根将裁员6000人，因啤酒需求疲软
item.description: 海尼根周三宣布将裁减全球员工6000人，并下调2026年利润增长预期，该预期低于一年前的预测。这家荷兰啤酒巨头及其同行正面临啤酒需求疲软的困境。【原文：Heineken said on Wednesday it would cut up to 6,000 jobs from its global workforce and set lower expectations for profit growth in 2026 than a year earlier, as the Dutch brewer and its peers grapple with weak demand for beers.】

item.title: 西门子能源利润近翻三倍，得益于燃气轮机和电网需求激增
item.description: 西门子能源周三表示，受燃气轮机和电网设备需求强劲以及陷入困境的风电部门亏损收窄推动，其财年头三个月的净利润几乎翻了两番。【原文：Siemens Energy on Wednesday said net profit nearly tripled in the first three months of its fiscal year, boosted by strong demand for gas turbines and grid equipment as well as a narrower loss at its struggling wind division.】

item.title: 潜艇制造商TKMS订单积压创纪录达220亿美元，上调销售预期
item.description: 德国潜艇制造商TKMS周三表示，其订单积压量已攀升至220亿美元的新高，并上调了销售预期。该公司指出，在当前地缘政治紧张局势加剧的背景下，军舰需求显著增长。【原文：TKMS hit a fresh $22 billion high in order backlog and raised its sales outlook, the German submarine maker said on Wednesday, citing a boost in demand for warships at a time of rising geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 韩国加密货币交易所Bithumb称系统漏洞导致400亿美元错误
item.description: 韩国加密货币交易所Bithumb周三表示，其内部系统存在严重漏洞，不仅可能遭受破坏，更未能阻止上周逾400亿美元资产的错误转移。【原文：South Korea's Bithumb said on Wednesday that serious flaws had left the crypto exchange's internal system susceptible to potential sabotage and failed to prevent an erroneous transfer of more than $40 billion in assets last week.】

item.title: 消息人士称，黑石集团增持人工智能初创公司Anthropic股份，投资额增至约10亿美元
item.description: 知情人士周二向路透社透露，黑石集团正加大对克劳德聊天机器人制造商Anthropic的投资力度，以约3500亿美元的估值将其持股比例提升至约10亿美元。【原文：Blackstone is increasing its investment in the Claude chatbot maker Anthropic, raising its stake to about $1 billion at a valuation of roughly $350 billion, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日元强势反弹，因美国消费引擎失速
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 美国1月就业增长可能加速；失业率预计维持在4.4%不变
item.description: 1月份美国就业增长可能有所回升，部分季节性行业裁员减少提供了支撑，但劳动力市场依然疲软——进口关税的不确定性持续抑制招聘，而更严格的移民执法限制了劳动力供给。【原文：U.S. job growth likely picked up in January, supported by fewer layoffs in some seasonal industries, but the labor market remained sluggish as lingering uncertainty over import tariffs tempered hiring and tighter immigration enforcement constrained the supply of workers.】

item.title: 对于斯沃琪而言，战略调整的时钟正在滴答作响
item.description: 瑞士手表制造商斯沃琪若想扭转多年利润下滑的局面并重建投资者信心，就必须重振创新能力、精简品牌组合并彻底改革公司治理。【原文：Swatch needs to revive innovation, slim its brand portfolio and overhaul governance if the Swiss watchmaker is to reverse years of falling profits and rebuild investor confidence.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称字节跳动正研发AI芯片，与三星商谈代工事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国字节跳动公司正在研发人工智能芯片，并与三星电子洽谈代工事宜。作为TikTok母公司，字节跳动正致力于确保先进处理器的供应渠道。【原文：China's ByteDance is developing an artificial intelligence chip and is in talks with Samsung Electronics to manufacture it, two people familiar with the matter said, as the TikTok parent seeks to secure supply of advanced processors.】

item.title: 迪拜DXB机场预计今年旅客吞吐量将接近1亿人次
item.description: 迪拜国际机场（DXB）作为全球最繁忙的航空枢纽，其运营方周三表示，今年旅客吞吐量预计将接近1亿人次，延续2025年创下的历史纪录。【原文：Dubai International Airport (DXB), the world's busiest travel hub, is expected to handle close to 100 million passengers this year, its operator said on Wednesday, building on a record performance in 2025.】

item.title: 美国众议院否决禁止对特朗普关税政策提出质疑的动议，民主党人准备就加拿大关税问题进行投票
item.description: 美国众议院周二以微弱优势否决了共和党领导层阻止对特朗普关税政策发起立法挑战的动议，此举可能使民主党人得以尝试撤销美国对加拿大的关税措施。【原文：A narrowly divided U.S. House of Representatives rejected on Tuesday a bid by Republican leaders to block legislative challenges to President Donald Trump's tariffs, a move that could allow Democrats to try to undo U.S. tariffs on Canada.】

item.title: 中芯国际将扩建晶圆产能以满足强劲芯片需求，同时警告利润率将受冲击
item.description: 中国最大的代工芯片制造商中芯国际(0981.HK)警告称，由于为满足强劲的芯片需求而大幅扩大产能，预计折旧成本将激增，今年利润率将面临压力。【原文：China's largest contract chipmaker, Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp 0981.HK, warned of margin pressure this year as it expects a surge in depreciation costs due to a massive capacity expansion to meet strong demand for chips.】

item.title: 新西兰航空空乘人员因谈判陷入僵局将举行罢工，工会称
item.description: 新西兰工会E tū周三表示，由于谈判未能解决员工关切，新西兰航空宽体客机机组人员将于2月12日和13日举行罢工。【原文：Air New Zealand's wide-body cabin crew will strike on February 12 and February 13 after negotiations failed to resolve workers' concerns, a New Zealand-based trade union E tū said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI公司两名联合创始人辞职，加入离职潮
item.description: xAI联合创始人吴小骥（Tony Wu）和巴吉米（Jimmy Ba）在社交媒体发文称，他们已从这家不到三年前与亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克共同创立的人工智能公司辞职。【原文：xAI co-founders Tony Wu and Jimmy Ba have resigned from the artificial intelligence firm they started with billionaire Elon Musk less than three years ago, they said in social media posts.】

item.title: 韩国产业通商资源部长官表示，OpenAI、三星和SK将于3月在韩国启动数据中心建设。
item.description: 韩国科技部长裴庆勋周三在首尔国会听证会上表示，OpenAI、三星电子和SK海力士正准备于3月在韩国启动数据中心建设。【原文：OpenAI, Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix are preparing to start construction of data centres in South Korea in March, Science Minister Bae Kyung-hoon said at a parliamentary hearing on Wednesday in Seoul.】

item.title: 日元因日本财政担忧消散而走强，澳元因澳联储鹰派立场跳涨
item.description: 周三日元延续强劲涨势，因投资者押注首相高市早苗在选举中取得压倒性胜利，使其在推行更负责任的财政政策方面占据有利地位。【原文：The yen held on to solid gains on Wednesday as investors bet that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's landslide election victory puts her in a strong position to pursue more fiscally responsible policies.】

item.title: 金银价格攀升，因美国零售销售疲软导致国债收益率下跌
item.description: 周三金银价格上涨，因数据显示12月零售销售增长停滞，美国国债收益率随之回落，这预示着在关键就业数据公布前经济将趋于疲软。【原文：Gold and silver prices rose on Wednesday as U.S. Treasury bond yields fell after data showed December retail sales growth stalled, signalling a softening economy ahead of key jobs data.】

item.title: 油价持稳，因美伊紧张局势提供支撑
item.description: 周三油价持稳，因市场等待方向指引，而美伊谈判仍在进行，持续的地缘政治不确定性支撑着油价。【原文：Oil held steady on Wednesday, finding support as the market waited for direction while U.S.–Iran talks continued, with lingering geopolitical uncertainty helping to underpin prices.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者安科拉敦促华纳兄弟放弃与奈飞的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，激进投资者安科拉控股公司已斥资约2亿美元购入华纳兄弟探索公司股份，并计划反对华纳将旗下珍贵影视资产出售给奈飞的交易。【原文：Activist investor Ancora Holdings has built a roughly $200 million stake in Warner Bros Discovery and plans to oppose Warner's deal to sell its prized TV and film assets to Netflix , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 股市因美国消费放缓迹象而暂停涨势
item.description: 周三，美国零售销售数据低于预期后，债券价格跳涨，股市反弹势头放缓；与此同时，日元升值势头持续，这可能预示着日本大选后投资者思维的转变。【原文：Bonds jumped and a rebound in stock markets slowed down on Wednesday after softer-than-expected U.S. retail sales figures, while a rally in the yen has extended and might be beginning to signal a shift in investor thinking since Japan's election.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局称，空中交通管制系统改造管理合同价值15亿美元。
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周二表示，其与国家安全公司佩拉顿签订的合同价值15亿美元。佩拉顿作为项目管理方，负责耗资125亿美元的美国老旧空中交通管制系统改造工程。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Tuesday its contract with national security firm Peraton, the project manager of a $12.5-billion effort to overhaul the aging U.S. air traffic control system, was worth $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 拉夫·劳伦抢先纽约时装周发布2026秋冬系列
item.description: 拉尔夫·劳伦于周二提前揭幕2026秋冬女装系列，在纽约时装周正式开幕前，呈现了灰色调束腰西装外套、天鹅绒连衣裙及水晶胸针等单品。【原文：Ralph Lauren presented its Fall 2026 women's collection with gray-toned corset blazers, velvet dresses and crystal brooches on Tuesday, ahead of the official start of New York Fashion Week.】

item.title: 中国李克强视察稀土设施，暗示在美中竞争中掌握筹码
item.description: 中国第二号人物、国务院总理李强周二视察了位于南方江西省的稀土设施，新华社报道称，此次视察旨在暗示中国与美国在战略矿产领域的竞争正在加剧。【原文：China's second-ranking official, Premier Li Qiang,inspected rare earth facilities in the southern province of Jiangxi on Tuesday, state news agency Xinhua reported, using the visit to hint at intensifying competition with the U.S. over strategic minerals.】

item.title: 三星电子高管表示，内存芯片需求今年将保持强劲，并将持续至2027年。
item.description: 三星电子周三表示，预计今年内存芯片需求将持续强劲，并延续至明年，公司高管指出，人工智能驱动的需求强劲是主要原因。【原文：Samsung Electronics expects strong demand for memory chips to continue this year and extend into next, a company executive said on Wednesday, citing robust demand driven by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局称，加拿大预计将宣布对湾流喷气机的认证
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周二表示，他预计加拿大将宣布为部分延迟多年的湾流公务机颁发认证，从而解决特朗普总统曾重点提及的问题。【原文：The head of the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Tuesday he expected Canada would announce it was certifying some Gulfstream business jets that had been delayed for years, resolving an issue highlighted by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Cloudflare预测全年销售额将超预期，人工智能推动云服务需求增长
item.description: Cloudflare周二预测全年及第一季度销售额将超出华尔街预期，押注人工智能技术的快速发展将推动其云服务需求。【原文：Cloudflare forecast annual and first-quarter sales above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on the rapid development of artificial intelligence technology to drive demand for its cloud services.】

item.title: 保险商Assurant利润因住房业务强劲及灾难减少而上升
item.description: 保险公司Assurant周二报告称，受其住房业务部门表现强劲以及灾难损失减少的推动，第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：Insurer Assurant reported a rise fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by strength in its housing unit and lower catastrophes.】

item.title: 美国食品药品监督管理局拒绝审评莫德纳公司流感疫苗申请
item.description: 美国食品药品监督管理局表示不会审核莫德纳公司流感疫苗的审批申请，该公司周二宣布这一消息后，其股价在盘后交易中下跌8%。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration will not review Moderna's approval application for its influenza vaccine, the company said on Tuesday, sending its shares down 8% in extended trading.】
